entities.description: The age at which the respondent first used OxyContin in a way that a doctor did not direct.
The month in which the respondent first used OxyContin in a way a doctor did not direct.
The recency of the respondent's misuse of pain relievers, recorded by specific time frames.
Indicates if the respondent has used any prescription pain reliever in a way a doctor did not direct.

relationships.description: Links the respondent to their age of first OxyContin misuse.
Links the respondent to the month of their first OxyContin misuse.
Indicates the time frame of the respondent's most recent misuse of pain relievers.
Indicates whether the respondent has misused any prescription pain reliever.
